com.rolledback.framework

Class GraphicsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rolledback.framework.GraphicsManager

  • public class GraphicsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The GraphicsManager loads and stores all grapical related objects for the game. This includes tile textures and unit images.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Rayermann (rolledback, www.github.com/rolledback, www.cs.utexas.edu/~mrayer)

      Retrieves the array of unit textures.
      static java.awt.Image[] typetoImage(com.rolledback.units.Unit.UNIT_TYPE type, int team)
      Given a specific unit type and the number representing what color of unit is desired, returns an array containing both the left and right (in that order) facing images for that unit.

    • Method Detail

      • typetoImage

        public static java.awt.Image[] typetoImage(com.rolledback.units.Unit.UNIT_TYPE type,
                           int team)
        Given a specific unit type and the number representing what color of unit is desired, returns an array containing both the left and right (in that order) facing images for that unit.
        Parameters:
        type - the unit type for what image is wanted
        team - represents what color of unit is wanted, 1 for red, 2 for blue
        Returns:
        array of images corresponding to type and team

      • getUnitImages

        public static java.awt.Image[] getUnitImages()
        Retrieves the array of unit textures.
        Returns:
        the unitImages array.

      • getTileTextures

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.awt.Image> getTileTextures()
        Returns the hash map of tile textures.
        Returns:
        the tileTextures hash map.
